          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Albrech Dürer: Önarckép, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, München, 67,1x48,7 cm, olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Albrech Dürer: Self-portrait in Furry Gown, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 cm, oil, canvas.</string>

peludo, 1500, Alte Pinakothek, Munich, 67,1x48,7 centímetro, aceite, 
lona.</string>
